Name: Pulses of the Plains
Description: Zahira, one of the "Startorch's Seven Great Mysteries," appears to be "negotiating" with a researcher. Her animated hand gestures give no clue whether she's casting a spell or haggling in some mysterious trade…
QuestDesc: Zahira, one of the "Startorch's Seven Great Mysteries," appears to be "negotiating" with a researcher. Her animated hand gestures give no clue whether she's casting a spell or haggling in some mysterious trade…

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, Miss Zahira… d-don't tease me like that…

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That "Startorch's Seven Great Mysteries" and "Mindbending Herder" stuff… t-they're just rumors… right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zahira gives a sly blink, her hands still moving without the slightest intention of stopping.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem... What I mean to say is, the new route network is still in testing. It's really... um... not safe to let the Exoswarm run on it yet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand how you feel, Miss Zahira. After that land collapse, almost every old road across the Etching Plains was buried.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since then, everyone's had to take a detour several times longer than the old route just to avoid the Void Storm. For urgent deliveries, that means racing non-stop the long way around.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will make progress on this project. I promise.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zahira purses her lips...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've got to believe me! I even burned the midnight oil making these recruitment posters for test volunteers!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zahira points proudly at herself, eyes glittering.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You mean... you want to be a tester yourself, Miss Zahira? That's really kind, but...

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...We actually prefer using motorbikes for data collection. You see, they're faster and carry more gear—

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zahira folds her arms and squints skeptically.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Then, as if suddenly remembering the "reliable, helpful" person beside her, she hops over and gently pushes you forward.)

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm just a student passing by...

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …You want this {Male=gentleman;Female=lady} to be a tester?

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=He;Female=She} does look like a Startorch student. Must have access to vehicles, already know the basics… Yes, {Male=he;Female=she} would be perfect.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But of course, we need {Male=his;Female=her} consent first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh—right, I should introduce myself. I'm Elowyn, a researcher with the Spacetrek Collective.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My colleagues and I are rebuilding the route network that collapsed across the Etching Plains. With our recent progress, we're finally planning the next step… but we're short on testers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So… would you be willing to lend us a hand?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (She gives a firm nod.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, and this is Miss Zahira. She's a regular trader at the Royan Market. She's the one who, well, recommended you.

Options.PlotLineKey: Glad to meet you, Miss Mysterious-Who-Can-Bend-Minds.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zahira bats her eyelashes playfully.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zahira tilts her head, flashing you a mischievous, triumphant grin.)

Options.PlotLineKey: Just tell me what you need.
I'll be your tester, but only if...

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, really? That's wonderful!

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rewards, right? Don't worry, we'll have those prepared for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, love the enthusiasm!

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me register your student ID first. Then we can jump right into the work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Name… {PlayerName}. Student number… there. It's uploaded.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfect, {PlayerName}. Please get ready and listen to my instructions closely, alright?

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: First things first, we need to "print out" the route we'll be testing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You heard right. It's a kind of "road crafting." The technology enables us to dynamically generate new road surfaces for emergency situations or rough terrain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've already set up the Smartprint Cube here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once we activate it, the linked Route Constructor will boot up on its own and generate the first test route.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Impressive! Clear data, precise execution... a truly valuable test run.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seems Miss Zahira read your abilities perfectly. Thank you both for your help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zahira smiles in agreement.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't sell yourself short. Your trust and cooperation mean a lot to us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I used to think this job was… Well, trivial compared to my research on the Exostrider. But seeing how it actually improves people's lives makes me genuinely happy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nothing beats getting closer to your goal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zahira picks a tiny wildflower and offers it to Elowyn, then turns with a gentle smile and places another in your palm.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Miss Zahira… what's this?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I guess it's her way of saying "thank you." A little gift to lift your spirits.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zahira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zahira nods.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You should be proud of the work you're doing. It truly matters.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before we reach for the stars, we have to learn to run on solid ground first, don't we?

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Mm. You're right…

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}. And you too, Miss Zahira.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, here's your reward for today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright… I'll start processing all the test data. A new route map will be ready soon. You have my word.

Options.PlotLineKey: If you ever need help again, feel free to call me.
Let me know if there's another job like this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Elowyn
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, of course. I'll keep that in mind.
